授業目的: 本講義の目的は、国際関係学の学問としての歴史的起源や基本的なコンセプトや理論を学ぶ事を通し、受講生が国際関係論の基礎を身につける事を目的とする。
到達目標: 本講義を履修する事により、国際関係学における主要な専門用語や主な議論のテーマ、コンセプトを把握し、国際政治における様々な問題に対する基礎的分析力を培う事を目標とする。
特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
授業方法: This course will be offered in a classroom setting from the first class.  There may be some class cancellations and make-up classes subsequently. In case of cancellation, make-up classes will be held either on days designated by the school or on Saturday (time period would be decided upon consultations between lecturer and students).  For student permitted to take classes online, they will join the class via Zoom.

評価.成績評価Grading4:
備考　Note
The course has the following sets of requirements:

1. Class participation. Students will be requested to contribute to class through actively asking questions
and making comments.
2. One oral report. Each student will be requested to make an oral report in class on their designated
chapter among reading assignments.
3. Performance in two debate sessions. Students will be requested to actively participate in the debate
sessions.
4. Final examination. Students are expected to respond to essay questions to
demonstrate their mastery of key terms, concepts and theories in the study of International
Relations.

Course grades will be calculated in the following manner:

Class participation 20%
One in-class oral report 15%
Performance in Debate 30% (15% X 2)
Final examination 35%

Overall feedback to the final examination will be posted in LUNA once grading is completed.
